bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted and shaped with PowerDiamond down tube, Integrated head tube, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy butted seat stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, Fuji forged road dropout with replaceable derailleur hanger,

components.description: FSA SLK Carbon Compact road ISIS spline, CNC 36/50T Chainrings
Shimano Ultegra Shifter/Brake, Flight Deck compatible
Cane Creek 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow alloy top cap and InterLoc spacer
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer , 420g
Ritchey WCS 31.8mm Road, 2014 Net Forged,+/-6 degree
Shimano Ultegra shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Fuji Featherweight Racing with carbon base and Titanium rails
